page.title: 19OVERY STAITHE - GOOD & BAD
page.content: In winter Burnham Overy Staithe is not a pleasant place. Not many people go to stay in Overy in winter. It is in direct line with the North Pole, that is why it is so cold in the winter. You could say it is like a ghost town. In summer it is not like a ghost town at all. There are a lot of people in Overy Staithe in summer. Burnham Overy is a beautiful place. When the tide is right people go crabbing, but most people go down to the beach. Almost everyone goes to see Gun Hill. On a very hot day it is like being in a pan of boiling water. It used to be an enormous hill but now its just a mound with a crater in the middle which is very deep.
